creator: Robb
title: Pencil Machine
description: The project is a pencil-making machine designed to evoke a feeling when presenting a pencil. It uses a clay extruder, a conveyor belt, a stamping mechanism, and a toaster oven to create a finished pencil.
steps: Pull lever 1 to extrude yellow Sculpty polymer clay into a hexagonal shape around the lead, using the architectural lead holder to center the lead. Cut both ends when the clay reaches the lead holder.
Lift lever 2 to drop the clay-wrapped graphite stick onto a hand-cranked, heat-proof conveyor belt.
Crank the belt, guiding the pencil under a rubber stamp.
Stamp the pencil by depressing lever 3, and crank the belt further to move the pencil into an overturned toaster.
Depress lever 4 to activate the toaster oven for one minute.
Crank the belt further until the pencil falls onto a cooling rack. Cool for one minute.
Die-cut an eraser from a block of rubber and fit it to the pencil end using a half-inch strip of aluminum tape.
